Text: The 1997 EA-Generali Ladies Linz was a women's tennis tournament played on indoor hard courts at the Intersport Arena in Linz in Austria that was part of Tier III of the 1997 WTA Tour.
Triplets:<The 1997 EA-Generali Ladies Linz
2:

Text: 1997 EA-Generali Ladies Linz:  Chanda Rubin won the singles title.
